short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Minimalist meditation timer, featuring two modes: Energise and Calm. Access using the sidebar or a shortcut.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take 30 seconds with Meditation Timer to relax with our guided meditations. Our app features two modes: Calm and Energise.
